General.Name: Silver Ridge Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Silver Ridge Holdings Bhd., an investment holding company, provides telecommunication system architecture and design, network, and telecommunication related software solutions in Malaysia. It engages in the creation, commission, marketing, and distribution of digitalized mobile contents; and provision of telecommunication services and network facility provider, and management of telecommunication towers. The company offers telecommunication solutions, including network design, installation and maintenance, in-building solutions, and fiber-to-the-home connectivity; network solutions, such as network security, network monitoring systems, load balancing, PABX, endpoint/server protection, and UPS and WAN optimization services; and other services, which includes smarthome, smart/safe city, e-learning, and green technology products and solutions. Silver Ridge Holdings Bhd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
